item.description:
Mea Culpa!  My error! My bad! I goofed! I erred! Ooops!

 

Let's change the venue and save the evening.

 

Let's meet at the MFA instead -- there is no admission charge Wednesday evenings, but there is a suggested contribution of $25.

 

There are a few good exhibits there now that I haven't seen, and one I'd like to revisit.

 

If you haven't seen the Testino exhibit or the Gersht exhibit , they are closing soon and you should see them.

 

I saw The Postcard Age: Selections from the Leonard A. Lauder Collection

Postcard exhibit and it is great.  I would like to see it again, and you should see it, too.  I'd like to see the Art in the Street - European Posters exhibit and Kings, Queens and Courtiers: Royalty on Paper.  Ok, that's mostly graphic art.

 

Ok, let's meet in the lobby on the Huntington Street side of the museum at 7:00 pm, by the statue of Orpheus and Cerberus. .   If you'll be late, I'll post an itinerary here later, and you can just catch up with us.  If you really can't find us, call me at 617 710 4351.

 

Sorry for the error - hope to see you at the museum.
item.name: Change of Venue: MFA - see more exhibits Ron wants to see.(still kid-friendly)
